cms.query.QueryText: SELECT ##TOPN## ##COLUMNS## FROM (SELECT resourceStrings1.StringKey, resourceStrings1.StringIsCustom, CAST(defaultLanguage.TranslationText AS nvarchar(4000)) AS DefaultText, CAST(cultureLanguage.TranslationText AS nvarchar(4000)) AS CultureText FROM CMS_ResourceTranslation AS defaultLanguage INNER JOIN CMS_ResourceString AS resourceStrings1 ON resourceStrings1.StringID = defaultLanguage.TranslationStringID LEFT OUTER JOIN CMS_ResourceTranslation AS cultureLanguage ON defaultLanguage.TranslationStringID = cultureLanguage.TranslationStringID AND (cultureLanguage.TranslationCultureID IS NULL OR cultureLanguage.TranslationCultureID = @Culture) WHERE (defaultLanguage.TranslationCultureID = @DefaultCultureID) UNION SELECT resourceStrings2.StringKey, resourceStrings2.StringIsCustom, CAST(defaultLanguage.TranslationText AS nvarchar(4000)) AS DefaultText, CAST(cultureLanguage.TranslationText AS nvarchar(4000)) AS CultureText FROM CMS_ResourceTranslation AS cultureLanguage INNER JOIN CMS_ResourceString AS resourceStrings2 ON resourceStrings2.StringID = cultureLanguage.TranslationStringID LEFT OUTER JOIN CMS_ResourceTranslation AS defaultLanguage ON defaultLanguage.TranslationStringID = cultureLanguage.TranslationStringID AND defaultLanguage.TranslationCultureID IS NULL WHERE (cultureLanguage.TranslationCultureID = @Culture) AND (NOT EXISTS (SELECT TranslationID, TranslationStringID, TranslationCultureID, CAST(TranslationText AS nvarchar(4000)) AS Expr1 FROM CMS_ResourceTranslation WHERE (TranslationCultureID = @DefaultCultureID) AND (TranslationStringID = cultureLanguage.TranslationStringID))) UNION SELECT StringKey, StringIsCustom, NULL AS DefaultText, NULL AS CultureText FROM CMS_ResourceString WHERE (StringID NOT IN (SELECT TranslationStringID FROM CMS_ResourceTranslation AS CMS_ResourceTranslation_1 WHERE (TranslationCultureID = @Culture) OR (TranslationCultureID = @DefaultCultureID)))) AS StringInfoRows WHERE ##WHERE## ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##
